form.p: This template will create a bndrun for launching a framework using the Dubbo Server Distribution Provider and Hazelcast Discovery
Source code repo for this distribution provider: https://github.com/ECF/DubboProvider
Once created, you can resolve the run requirements by clicking the Resolve button the the right-hand side of the bndrun editor.
Once resolved, you can click on Run OSGi or Debug OSGi buttons in the upper right hand side of the bndrun editor to launch.
This will produce output to the OSGi console to show the export of the remote service
